name: Fidget Spinner - How Fast Can You Swipe?
name_original: Fidget Spinner - How Fast Can You Swipe?
description:
Haven't you got the fidget spinner yet?
Come & play this Fidget Spinner - How Faster Can You Swipe?

How to play:

Relax yourself while spinning the spinner. This includes the realistic effects of sound and play. It’s time to beat you best time before you run out of time. In every single spin, you have 30 moves to spin fast.

NOTE : It’s a fast challenge. Swipe as fast as you could in 30 moves. How much faster can you spin and reach high score? Can you swipe 30 times before the timer runs out?

Unlock different characters. It’s a way great time killer

It’s a great addiction. Do give it a try. Download Now!
